title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.235 - Preparation for welding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.235 - Preparation for welding

State Regulations
(a) Before
beginning any welding, the welding surfaces must be clean and free of any
material that may be detrimental to the weld, and the pipe or component must be
aligned to provide the most favorable condition for depositing the root bead. This alignment must be preserved while the root bead is being
deposited. (b) See Appendix 14-J of
this Title for acceptable preparation for butt welding pipe of unequal
thicknesses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.235

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
